citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
One reviewed protocol did not have a clear and thorough description for determining humane endpoints for the animals
on study. It is essential that this information be provided in order to ensure humane and judicious use of the animals.
Proposals to conduct an activity involving animals must contain a complete description of the proposed use of the
animals.
To be corrected by 10/4/2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(e)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
One reviewed protocol did not have a clear and thorough description for determining humane endpoints for the animals 
on study.  It is essential that this information be provided in order to ensure humane and judicious use of the animals. 
Proposals to conduct an activity involving animals must contain a complete description of the proposed use of the 
animals. 
 
To be corrected by  10/4/2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
End Section
